dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3631 IH: State Strategic Stockpile Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carter of Georgia (for himself and Ms. Houlahan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to extend the authorization of appropriations for grants for State strategic stockpiles.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the State Strategic Stockpile Act of 2023.

section.header: Reauthorization of pilot program to support State medical stockpiles
section.text: Section 319F–2(i)(9) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 247d–6b(i)(9)) is amended by striking 2024 and inserting 2028.
